title: FM For Murder
description: Who shot the disk jockey on air? No one saw the killer, but many heard the murder!Local police are mystified, so they ask Psychology professor and acoustics expert Pamela Barnes to assist them in investigating the crime. Can she determine who shot disk jockey and cult music hero Black Vulture just by listening to the radio station’s audio recording of the crime? And how does this crime figure in to the impending death of a wealthy carpet manufacturer hundreds of miles away? Or the driven behavior of his conscientious son who is keeping a very important secret? Unbeknownst to Pamela, another thread of this strange mystery is about to unravel. Will she be able to solve it before another victim is claimed? FM FOR MURDER is Patricia Rockwell’s second in her acoustic mystery series featuring Pamela Barnes. In it, Rockwell re-introduces readers to a feisty heroine, who doesn’t let her academic duties and position prevent her from fighting for justice. Pamela fights crime with the tools she knows best—sound waves.
author: Patricia Rockwell
